speedometer.config.name: Speedometer Config
speedometer.config.category.name: Speedometer Config Category
speedometer.config.tooltip.xPosition.lin: W = the width of the screen
w = half the width of the screen
s = the width of the text or image
speedometer.config.tooltip.yPosition.lin: H = the height of the screen
h = half the height of the screen
s = the height of the text or image
speedometer.config.tooltip.imageSize: Size of the image. This sets both the height and width
speedometer.config.tooltip.showVisualSpe: I(the developer) discourages the use of this setting since it doesn't work on smaller sises and the fps breaks at larger
speedometer.config.tooltip.showSpeedType: This setting shows the speed type above the visual meter which is better then within the visual meter
speedometer.config.tooltip.override_colo: Override the color of a line pointer
OPS doesn't work if the pointer is an image!
speedometer.config.error.size_outofbound: The size is out of bounds 10<=size<=200
speedometer.error.missing_cloth: Missing Cloth Config API for Config Screen,
